arabicText: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Do	they	not	know	that	Allah	eases	the	
sustenance	for	whomever	He	wills,	and	
restricts	it?	Indeed	in	this	are	signs	for	the	
People	who	Believe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	unheñ	m’alom	nahiñ	ke	Allāh	rozi	
kushāda	kartā	hai	jis	ke	liye	chāhe	aur	tang	
farmātā	hai	be-shak	is	meiñ	zaroor		
nishāniyāñ	haiñ	Imān	wāloñ	ke	liye.

arabicText: ۞ قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	–	
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“O	my	*	
slaves,	who	have	wronged	themselves,	do	
not	lose	hope	in	Allah’s	mercy;	indeed	
Allah	forgives	all	sins;	indeed	He	only	is	the	
Oft	Forgiving,	the	Most	Merciful.”	(All	
Muslims	are	truly	the	slaves	of	Prophet	
Muhammad	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	aey	mere	woh	bando	jinhoñ	
ne	apni	jānoñ	par	ziyādti	ki	Allāh	ki	
Raḥmat	se	nā-ummid	na	ho	be-shak	Allāh	
sab	gunāh	bakhsh	detā	hai	be-shak	wohi	
bakhshne	wālā	maherbān		hai.

arabicText: وَأَنِيبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	incline	towards	your	Lord	and	submit	to	Him,	before	the	punishment	comes	you	and	then	
you	may	not	be	helped.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	apne	Rab	ki	ṭaraf	ruju’	lāo	aur	us	ke	ḥuzoor	gardan	rakho	qabl	is	ke	ke	tum	par	áƶāb	āaye	
phir	tumhāri	madad	na	ho.

arabicText: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَحْسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةًۭ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	follow	this,	the	best	among	all,	which	has	been	sent	down	towards	you	from	your	Lord,	
before	the	punishment	comes	suddenly	upon	you	whilst	you	are	unaware.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	ki	pairwi	karo	jo	achchhi	se	achchhi	tumhāre	Rab	se	tumhāri	ṭaraf	utāri	gayi	qabl	is	ke	ke	
áƶāb	tum	par	achānk	āa	jāye	aur	tumheñ	khabar	na	ho..

arabicText: أَن تَقُولَ نَفْسٌۭ يَـٰحَسْرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّـٰخِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	that	no	soul	may	say,	“Alas!	The	failures	that	I	committed	regarding	Allah	-	and	indeed	I	used	
to	mock!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ke	kahiñ	koyi	jān	yeh	na	kahe	ke	hāye	afsos	un	taqsiroñ	par	jo	maiñ	ne	Allāh	ke	bare	meiñ	kiñ	
aur	be-shak	maiñ	hansi	banāyā	kartā	thā.

arabicText: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	(so	that	no	soul)	may	say,	“If	Allah	had	
shown	me	the	right	path,	I	would	then	be	
among	the	pious!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	kahe	agar	Allāh	mujhe	rāh	dikhātā	to	
maiñ	dar	wāloñ	meiñ	hotā.	.

arabicText: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى كَرَّةًۭ فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	(so	that	no	soul)	may	say	when	it	
beholds	the	punishment,	“If	only	I	may	be	
sent	back,	so	that	I	may	do	good	deeds!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	kahe	jab	áƶāb	dekhe	kisi	ṭaraḥ	mujhe	
wāpsi	mile	ke	maiñ	nekiyāñ	karuñ.

arabicText: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
It	will	be	said	to	him,	“Surely	yes,	why	
not?*	My	signs	did	come	to	you,	so	you	
denied	them	and	you	were	haughty	and	
you	were	a	disbeliever.”	(They	will	be	
mocked	at.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hāñ	kiyuñ	nahiñ	be-shak	tere	pās	meri	
āayateñ	āayiñ	to	tu	ne	unheñ	jhutlāyā	aur	
takabbur	Kiyā		aur	tu	kāfir	thā.

arabicText: وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسْوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًۭى لِّلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	you	will	see	on	the	Day	of	
Resurrection	the	fabricators	of	lies	against	
Allah,	with	their	faces	blackened;	is	not	the	
destination	of	the	haughty	in	hell?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Qiyāmat	ke	din	tum	dekho	ge	unheñ	
jinhoñ	ne	Allāh	par	jhoot	bāndhā	ke	un	ke	
muñh	kāle	haiñ	kyā	maghroor	kā	thikānā	
jahannam	meiñ	nahiñ.

arabicText: وَيُنَجِّى ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	Allah	will	rescue	the	pious,	to	their	
place	of	salvation;	neither	will	the	
punishment	touch	them,	nor	shall	they	
grieve.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allāh	bachāyegā	parhezgāroñ	ko	un	ki	
najāt	ki	jagah	na	unheñ	áƶāb	chhuye	aur	na	
unheñ	gham	ho.

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ وَكِيلٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	is	Creator	of	all	things;	and	He	only	is	
the	Controller	of	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	har	cheez	kā	paidā	karne	wālā	hai	aur	
woh	har	cheez	kā	mukhtār	hai.

arabicText: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
For	Him	only	are	the	keys	of	the	heavens	
and	the	earth;	and	those	who	denied	the	
signs	of	Allah	–	it	is	they	who	are	the	losers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Usi	ke	liye	haiñ	āasmānoñ	aur	zamin	ki	
kunjiyāñ	aur	jinhoñ	ne	Allāh	ki	āayatoñ	kā	
inkār	Kiyā		wohi	nuqsān	meiñ	haiñ.

arabicText: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأْمُرُوٓنِّىٓ أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	“So	do	you	instruct	me	to	
worship	(deities)	other	than	Allah?	You	ignorant	fools!”
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	farmāo	to	kyā		Allāh	ke	siwā	doosre	ke	poojne	ko	mujh	se	kahte	ho	aey	jāhilo.

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	was	indeed	revealed	to	you	and	to	those	before	you;	that,	“O	listener!	If	you	ascribe	a	
partner	to	Allah,	all	your	deeds	will	go	to	waste	and	you	will	surely	be	a	loser.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	waḥi	ki	gayi	tumhāri	ṭaraf	aur	tum	se	agloñ	ki	ṭaraf	ke	aey	sunne	wāle!	Agar	tu	ne	
Allāh	kā	sharik	Kiyā		to	zaroor	terā	sab	kiyā	dharā	akārat	jāye	gā	aur	zaroor	to	hār	meiñ	rahe	gā.

arabicText: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText: But	rather	worship	only	Allah,	and	be	among	the	thankful!
romanUrduTranslationText: Balke	Allāh	hi	ki	bandagi	kar	aur	shukr	wāloñ	se	ho.

arabicText: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦ وَٱلْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًۭا قَبْضَتُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ مَطْوِيَّـٰتٌۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	did	not	realise	the	importance	of	Allah	as	was	His	right;	and	on	the	Day	of	Resurrection,	
He	will	compress	the	lands	and	the	heavens	will	be	rolled	up	by	His	power;	Purity	and	Supremacy	
are	to	Him,	from	all	what	they	ascribe	as	partners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unhoñ	ne	Allāh	ki	qadr	na	ki	jaisā	ke	us	kā	ḥāq	thā	aur	woh	Qiyāmat	ke	din	sab	zaminoñ	ko	
samet	de	gā	aur	us	ki	Qudrat	se	sab	āasmān	lapet	diye	jāyeñ	ge	aur	un	ke	shirk	se	pāk	aur	bartar	
hai.

arabicText: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌۭ يَنظُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	Trumpet	will	be	blown,	so	
everyone	in	the	heavens	and	everyone	in	
the	earth	will	fall	unconscious,	except	
whomever	*	Allah	wills;	it	will	then	be	
blown	again,	thereupon	they	will	get	up	
staring!	(*Prophet	Moosa	and	/	or	some	
angels).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Soor	phooñkā	jayegā	to	be-hosh	ho	
jāyeñge	jitney	āasmānoñ	meiñ	haiñ	aur	
jitney	zamin	meiñ	magar	jise	Allāh	chāhe	
phir	woh	dobāra	phooñkā	jaye	gā	jabhi	
woh	dekhte	huye	khade	ho	jāyeñ	ge.

arabicText: وَأَشْرَقَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ وَجِا۟ىٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	earth	will	shine	bright	by	the	light	
of	its	Lord,	and	the	Book	will	be	
established,	and	the	Prophets	and	this	
Noble	Prophet	and	the	witnesses	upon	
them	from	this	nation	will	be	brought,	and	
it	will	be	judged	between	them	with	the	
truth,	and	they	will	not	be	wronged
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	zamin	jagmagā	uthe	gi	apne	Rab	ke	
Noor	se	aur	rakhi	jāye	gi	kitāb	aur	lāye	
jāyeñ	ge	Ambyā	aur	yeh	Nabi	aur	is	ki	
Ummat	ke	un	par	gawāh	hoñ	ge	aur	logoñ	
meiñ	sachchā	faisla	farmā	diyā	jāye	gā	aur	
un	par	zulm	na	hogā.

arabicText: وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	every	soul	will	be	repaid	for	its	deeds	
in	full,	and	He	knows	very	well	what	they	
used	to	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	har	jān	ko	us	kā	Kiyā		bharpor	diyā	jāye	
gā	aur	usey	khoob	m’aloom	hai	jo	woh	
karte	the.

arabicText: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌۭ مِّنكُمْ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكُمْ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	disbelievers	will	be	herded	
towards	hell	in	groups;	to	the	extent	that	
when	they	reach	it,	its	gates	will	be	
opened,	and	its	guards	will	say	to	them,	
“Did	not	the	Noble	Messengers	come	to	
you	from	amongst	you,	who	used	to	recite	
to	you	the	verses	of	your	Lord	and	warn	
you	of	confronting	this	Day?”	They	will	say,	
“Yes	indeed,	why	not?”	But	the	Word	of	
punishment	proved	true	upon	the	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfir	Jahannam	ki	ṭaraf	hāñke	jāyeñ	ge	
giroh	giroh	yahān	tak	ki	jab	wahāñ	
pahuñcheñ	ge	us	ke	darwāze	khole	jāyeñ	
ge	aur	us	ke	dārogha	un	se	kaheñ	ge	Kyā		
tumhāre	pās	tumhiñ	meiñ	se	woh	rasol	na	
āaye	the	jo	tum	par	tumhāre	Rab	ki	
Āayateñ	pardhte	the	is	din	ke	milne	se	
darāte	the	kaheñ	ge	kiyuñ	nahiñ	magar	
áƶāb	kā	qaul	kāfiroñ	par	thik	utrā.

arabicText: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
It	will	be	said,	“Enter	the	gates	of	hell	to	remain	in	it	forever”;	so	what	a	wretched	destination	for	
the	haughty!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāyā	jāye	gā	dākhil	ho	Jahannam	ke	darwāzoñ	meiñ	us	meiñ	hamesha	rahne	to	kyā		hi	burā	
thikānā	mutakabbiroñ	kā.

arabicText: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ طِبْتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوهَا خَـٰلِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	mounts	of	those	who	feared	their	Lord	will	be	led	towards	Paradise,	in	groups;	to	the	
extent	that	when	they	reach	it,	its	gates	will	be	opened	and	its	guards	will	say	to	them,	“Peace	be	
upon	you!	You	have	done	well!	Therefore	enter	Paradise,	to	abide	in	it	forever.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	apne	Rab	se	darte	the	un	ki	sawāriyāñ	giroh	giroh	Jannat	ki	ṭaraf	chalāyi	jāyeñ	gi	yahāñ	
tak	ke	jab	wahāñ	pahuñcheñ	ge	aur	us	ke	darwāze	khule	hoñ	ge	aur	us	ke	dārogha	un	se	kaheñ	
ge	salām	tum	par	tum	khoob	rahe	to	jannat	meiñ	jāo	hamsha	rahne.

arabicText: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعْدَهُۥ وَأَوْرَثَنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ حَيْثُ نَشَآءُ ۖ فَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	will	say,	“All	praise	is	to	Allah,	Who	has	made	His	promise	to	us	come	true,	and	has	
bequeathed	us	this	land,	to	stay	in	Paradise	wherever	we	wish!”	So	what	an	excellent	reward	for	
the	performers!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	kaheñ	ge	sab	khoobiyāñ	Allāh	ko	jis	ne	apnā	w’ada	ham	se	sachchā	kiyā	aur	hameñ	is	
zamin	kā	wāris	kiyā	ke	ham	Jannat	meiñ	raheñ	jahāñ	chāheñ	to	kyā	hi	achchā	sawāb	kāmiyoñ	kā.

arabicText: وَتَرَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنْ حَوْلِ ٱلْعَرْشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	you	will	see	the	angels	gathered	
around	the	Throne,	saying	the	Purity	of	
their	Lord,	with	praise;	and	a	true	
judgement	will	be	delivered	between	the	
people,	and	it	will	be	said,	“All	praise	is	to	
Allah,	the	Lord	Of	The	Creation!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	farishtoñ	ko	dekhoge	ársh	ke	āas	
pās	ḥalqa	kiye	apne	Rab	ki	tareef	ke	sāth	us	
ki	pāki	bolte	aur	logoñ	meiñ	sachchā	faisla	
farmā	diyā	jāyegā	aur	kahā	jāyegā	ke	sab	
khoobiyāñ	Allāh	ko	jo	sāre	jahān	kā	Rab.

arabicText: حمٓ
englishTranslationText:
Ha-Meem*.	(*Alphabets of the Arabic 
language; Allah and to whomever He 
reveals, know their precise meanings.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ha-Meem*.	(*Arabi zabān ke Huroof jinke 
Ma’āni Allah aur Jis par Allah Ta’āla ne 
Nazil Farmaya Wahi Janta hai.)

arabicText: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
The	revelation	of	the	Book	is	from	Allah,	
the	Most	Honourable,	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	kitāb	utārnā	hai	Allāh	ki	ṭaraf	se	jo	
Ízzat	wālā	'Ilm	wālā.

arabicText: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوْبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلْعِقَابِ ذِى ٱلطَّوْلِ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ إِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
The	Forgiver	of	sin,	and	the	Most	Acceptor	
of	Repentance,	the	Severe	in	Punishing,	the	
Greatly	Rewarding;	there	is	no	God	except	
Him;	towards	Him	only	is	the	return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Gunāh	bakhsh	ne	wālā	aur	tauba	qubool	
karne	wālā	Sakht	áƶāb	karne	wālā	bade	
in'āam	wālā	us	ke	siwā	koyi	m'abood	nahiñ	
usi	ki	ṭaraf	phirnā	hai.

arabicText: مَا يُجَـٰدِلُ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَلَا يَغْرُرْكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمْ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ
englishTranslationText:
None	except	the	disbelievers	dispute	the	
signs	of	Allah,	therefore	do	not	let	their	
free	movements	in	the	land	deceive	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ki	Āayatoñ	meiñ	jhagda	nahi	karte	
magar	kāfir	to	aey	sun	ne	wāle	tujhe	dhoka	
na	de	inka	shahroñ	meiñ	ahle-gahle	phirna.

arabicText: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۖ وَهَمَّتْ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍۭ بِرَسُولِهِمْ لِيَأْخُذُوهُ ۖ وَجَـٰدَلُوا۟ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ لِيُدْحِضُوا۟ بِهِ ٱلْحَقَّ فَأَخَذْتُهُمْ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Before	them,	the	people	of	Nooh	and	the	
groups	after	them	had	denied;	and	every	
nation	intended	to	apprehend	its	Noble	
Messenger,	and	they	fought	along	with	
falsehood	to	avert	the	truth,	so	I	seized	them;	so	how	did	My	punishment	turn	out?
romanUrduTranslationText:
In	se	pahle	Nūḥ	ki	qaum	aur	un	ke	b'ad	ke	
girohoñ	ne	jhutlāyā	aur	har	ummat	ne	yeh	
qasd	Kiyā		ke	apne	Rasool	ko	pakad	leñ	aur	
bāṭil	ke	sāth	jhagde	ke	us	se	ḥaq	ko	tāl	deñ	
to	maiñ	ne	unheñ	pakdā	phir	kaisā	huā	
merā	áƶāb.

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ
englishTranslationText:
And	this	is	how	the	Word	of	your	Lord	has	proved	true	upon	the	disbelievers	that	they	are	the	
people	of	hell.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	yoñhi	tumhāre	Rab	ki	bāt	kāfiroñ	par	sābit	ho	chuki	hai	ke	woh	dozakhi	haiñ.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحْمِلُونَ ٱلْعَرْشَ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَيُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ رَبَّنَا وَسِعْتَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۢ رَّحْمَةًۭ وَعِلْمًۭا فَٱغْفِرْ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
Those*	who	bear	the	Throne,	and	those	who	are	around	it,	say	the	Purity	of	their	Lord	while	
praising	Him,	and	they	believe	in	Him	and	seek	forgiveness	for	the	believers;	“O	Our	Lord!	Your	
mercy	and	knowledge	encompass	all	things,	therefore	forgive	those	who	repented	and	followed	
Your	path,	and	save	them	from	the	punishment	of	hell.”	(*	The	angels.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh*	jo	ársh	uthāte	haiñ	aur	jo	us	ke	gird	haiñ	apne	Rab	ki	t'arif	ke	sāth	us	ki	pāki	bolte	aur	us	
par	Imān	lāte	aur	musalmānoñ	ki	maghfirat	māñgte	haiñ	aey	rab	hamāre	tere	raḥmat	o	'ilm	meiñ	
har	cheez	ki	samāyi	hai	to	unheñ	bakhsh	de	jinhoñ	ne	tauba	ki	aur	teri	rāh	par	chale	aur	unheñ	
dozakh	ke	áƶāb	se	bachā	le.	(*Farishte)

arabicText: رَبَّنَا وَأَدْخِلْهُمْ جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدتَّهُمْ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنْ ءَابَآئِهِمْ وَأَزْوَٰجِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
“O	Our	Lord!	And	admit	them	into	the	
Gardens	of	everlasting	stay	which	you	
have	promised	them,	and	those	who	are	
virtuous	among	their	forefathers	and	their	
wives	and	their	offspring;	indeed	You	only	
are	the	Most	Honourable,	the	Wise.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	hāmare	Rab	aur	unheñ	basne	ke	
bāghoñ	meiñ	dākhil	kar	jinkā	tu	ne	un	se		
w'ada	farmāyā	hai	aur	un	ko	jo	nek	hoñ	un	
ke	bāp	dādā	aur	bibiyoñ	aur	aulād	meiñ	be
shak	tu	hi	'Izzat-o-Hikmat	wālā	hai.

arabicText: وَقِهِمُ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ۚ وَمَن تَقِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ فَقَدْ رَحِمْتَهُۥ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
“And	save	them	from	the	evil	
consequences	of	sins;	and	whomever	You	
save	from	the	evil	consequences	of	sins	on	
that	Day	-	so	You	have	indeed	had	mercy	
upon	him;	and	this	only	is	the	greatest	
success.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unheñ	gunāhoñ	ki	shāmat	se	bachā	le	
aur	jise	tu	us	din	gunāhoñh	ki	shāmat	se	
bachāye	to	be-shak	tu	ne	us	par	raḥam	
farmāyā	aur	yahi	badi	kāmyābi	hai.
